Classes

class  Params
 This class offers methods for easily using configuration files to change the values of variables in your programs. More...

Detailed Description

This file offers a class for dealing with configuration files.

The class in this file is used for configuration files, i.e. files that include values for variables used in your programs. See the description of class Params for further information.
